title: Why does my end-game stats take so long to load?
body: It takes at least 15 sec to load. By the time it finishes, I see other's chat message already.

replies.body: There's a pretty good chance that you have a certain option turned on which is making that lobby load so slow. Check you client options for something called **"close client during game"** and make sure that is not checked. Let me know if those after match lobbies are still taking so long to show up!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=5mOaBuFh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-27T23:30:47.027+0000)
